original_text: a messenger came to Job and said, “The oxen were plowing and the donkeys were grazing nearby,
korean_text: 사환이 욥에게 와서 아뢰되 소는 밭을 갈고 나귀는 그 곁에서 풀을 먹는데

sentences.original_text: a messenger came to Job and said
and the donkeys were grazing nearby
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나귀들은 근처에서 풀을 뜯고 있었습니다
